record.titleName: Commission on Freedom of the Press
record.description: Members of the Commission on the Freedom of the Press. Left to right: Arthur M. Schlesinger (professor of History, Harvard); Ruth A. Inglis (Commission staff member); Robert Redfield (dean, Division of Social Sciences, University of Chicago); William E. Hocking (professor of philosophy, emeritus, Harvard); Robert D. Leigh (Commission director); Llewellyn White (Commission assistant director); Robert M. Hutchins (chancellor of the University of Chicago, Commission Chairman); Zechariah Chafee, Jr., (professor of law, Harvard, Commission vice chairman); Kurt Riezler (professor of philosophy, New School for Social Research); Beardsley Ruml (chairman of the Board, R. H. Macy & Company, Inc.); Charles E. Merriam (professor of political science, emeritus, University of Chicago); George N. Shuster (president, Hunter College); Archibald MacLeish (former Assistant Secretary of State).
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Separate caption, not photographer listed, just "editor and publisher."
